00046                 Event(eventid_t::value_typeref eventid, datastruct::MutableCharArrayVector_ptr serialized) :
00047                     _eventid(eventid), _buffers(serialized->size()), _serialized(serialized),

00056                 template<typename T>
00057                 T at(unsigned index, const serialize::Pair& serializer)
00058                 {
00059                     return buffer_at(index, serializer)->data<T>();
00060                 }

00063                 T first(const serialize::Pair& serializer)
00064                 {
00065                     return at<T>(0, serializer);
00066                 }
00067

00072                 }
00073

00075                 {
00076                     return _buffers.at(index)->serialize();
00077                 }

00079                 void push_back(Buffer_ptr buffer)
00080                 {
00081                     boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(_lock);
00082                     _buffers.push_back(buffer);
00083                     _isSerialized.push_back(false);
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 void pop_back()
00087                 {
00088                     _buffers.pop_back();
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 bool isSerialized(int index)
00092                 {
00093                     return _serialized && _isSerialized[index];
00094                 }

00097                 {

00122 
00123                 Buffer_ptr buffer_at(int index, const serialize::Pair& serializer)
00124                 {
00125                     boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(_lock);
00126                     if(isSerialized(index))
00127                     {
00128                         datastruct::MutableCharArray_ptr mutarr = _serialized->at(index);
00129                         Buffer_ptr buffer = Buffer::deserialize(mutarr,
00130                                                                 serializer);
00131                         mutarr.reset(); // Free the datastruct::MutableCharArray_ptr (data ownership is given to the deserializer)
00132                         set_buffer(index, buffer);
00133                     }
00134                     return _buffers.at(index);
00135                 }
00136
